title: Victory/Defeat - Recall Bug
body: So i noticed a bug. If you Recall just before the camera starts scrolling to the Nexus destruction animation you'll Recall and your camera will lock to your Champion which will almost always be at your fountain. Not sure if this is intended but it looks odd.

replies.body:
> the Inhibitor destruction animation

lol, I think you mean Nexus.

If you cast a spell with uninterruptable cast time (eg. Caitlyn's Q, Vel'koz's E, recall) as the game ends, then any move commands which you set before casting will be set after the game ends, allowing you to move around while everyone's supposed to be uncontrollable. There are probably also commands like this for the camera.

The more you know...

Wait, this probably should be on the [Bug Report board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), not here.
